title: Seniors kicked up in jumbo cabinet
content: President Rajapaksa holding the hand of wounded JVP MP Sunil Handunnetti, trying to listen to what was being said amidst the din at the Parliament canteen where the customary Budget tea party was hosted. Pic by Gemunu Wellage Veteran ministers given big posts but little power UNP infighting worsens: Young MPs slam Ranil while Sajith…
